attributes.action: Create a fairer system for car insurance for younger drivers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, insurance premiums for new drivers are massive and unfairly biased with young female drivers being quoted less than young male drivers. I think that although there are a few young male drivers who want to risk their own and other peoples lives, the majority will be very capable drivers who are being discriminated against with such ridiculous premiums.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
